title: Six-year-old boy shot on playground in Southeast D.C.
content:
Six-year-old boy shot on playground in Southeast D.C., police say (ABC7)
WASHINGTON (ABC7) — A six-year-old boy was shot in Southeast D.C. on Saturday afternoon, the Metropolitan Police Department reports.
According to MPD Media Affairs, the boy was shot in the leg and taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
The incident happened in the 2500 block of Pomeroy Rd, according to officials.
ABC7's Sam Ford reports the boy was shot on a playground.
Police say they are looking for two black men wearing black masks.
This story will be updated with more information as more details come in.
